fields.label: Policy Overview
fields.description: Outlines the company's commitment to fundamental human rights, dignity, and compliance with WIETA/SIZA standards.

fields.label: Objectives
options: Adhere to local and international human rights standards
Prevent discrimination, child and forced labor
Ensure a safe and respectful workplace

fields.label: Responsibilities
options: Employees report violations and support human rights
Suppliers and contractors confirm human rights adherence

fields.label: Human Rights Principles
options: Freedom from discrimination and forced labor

fields.label: Compliance with Legislation and Standards
options: South African Constitution, BCEA, Employment Equity Act

fields.label: Human Rights Due Diligence
options: Provide training on rights and responsibilities

fields.label: Monitoring and Review
options: Regular policy updates and internal/external audits
